p: HCQ has a ten-fold concentration ratio in the lungs [ 21]. A recent review described a series of 85 case reports of children presenting interstitial lung diseases and treated with HCQ or CQ at doses ranging from 3.5 to 10 mg/kg body weight/day with a maximum of 600 mg/day. HCQ was well-tolerated in most cases with relatively few side effect. Of the 16 patients who were treated exclusively with HCQ or CQ, the symptoms improved in 14 cases [ 21].
